artistDesc: As  a 21-year-old music producer and DJ from Spain, NCS has earned a reputation for collaborating with EH! DE, My Heart [1], Pentakill. It is characterized by an addictive beat, although it varies from person to person.

DJ and producer. He was born in Russia (former Soviet Union) and grew up in Germany. He produces and produces house music of various genres such as electronic house and progressive house. Both parents were born in a musician's house. I studied piano and drums at the age of 4, and in 2002 I also played band in Germany. After that, he became interested in Justice, an electro house duo in France, and he will produce electronic music from 2009. Justice is an idol after Justice. (...) Chatti too much and hits ã…‹ I have learned from the age of four and have been playing a band life and have excellent piano playing ability, and all the songs It is also an excellent songwriter who writes and composes directly.
